hyperParameters.name: Epoch
hyperParameters.description: The number of epochs the model should train. Often values between 2 and 4 are used.
hyperParameters.topBorder: Biggest value allowed, applicable only to INTEGER and DOUBLE, can be null, then no limitation
hyperParameters.bottomBorder: Lowest value allowed, applicable only to INTEGER and DOUBLE, can be null, then no limitation

hyperParameters.name: Data
hyperParameters.description: Adress where the training data can be loaded
